job_title: Middle & Senior Data Engineer (Python, SQL, AI)
jd_text:
About Galaxy Joy 
Galaxy Joy operates Vietnam's leading loyalty platform, powering the Vietjet SkyJoy program andconnecting over 250 brand partners across thecountry. As we expand across ASEAN,we're building a world-class data infrastructure from the ground up to support real-time transaction processing, partner integrations, and data-driven decision making at scale
Job Description: 
We're looking for a Senior Data Engineer to join our growing data team and play a central role in transforming our data infrastructure into a modern, scalable platform. This is a hands-on leadership position where you'll own critical deliverables, drive architectural decisions, and help establish best practices as we build out our medallion architecture. You'll work across the full data stack, from ingestion and orchestration through transformation andanalytics, and have significant influence over how we design and operate our data platform.
1.Platform Modernization
You will drive the transformation of legacy systems into our modern data architecture. This includes championing engineering best practices such as code reviews, documentation, and testing, as well as mentoring junior team members andcontributing to building our data engineering culture.
2. Data Ingestion and Orchestration
You will design, develop, and maintain robust data pipelines using Apache Airflow and Python. This includes building and optimizing DAGs for ingesting data from brand partners with varying formats anddelivery methods. You'll ensure data quality and reliability at the point of ingestion with proper validation and error handling.
3. Data Transformation and Processing
You will own heavy data transformation workloads, translating complex business requirements into efficient Spark jobs. This involves building and maintaining scalable data pipelines that handle late arriving data, schema evolution, and partner data synchronization. You'll implement comprehensive monitoring and alerting to ensure pipeline health and data freshness, working with Delta Lake for reliable, ACID-compliant data processing.
4. Analytics and Reporting
You will design and optimize data models in Snowflake for analytical workloads. You'll partner with BI teams to ensure data is structured for effective Power BI reporting and self-service analytics, and build aggregation pipelines that support business intelligence and operational reporting needs.

job_title: Senior Application Operations (Vận hành ứng dụng)
jd_text:
Mục tiêu: Đảm bảo hệ thống/ứng dụng hoạt động ổn định, đáp ứng SLA, giám sát liên tục, xử lý sự cố kịp thời, và hỗ trợ các bộ phận vận hành nghiệp vụ.  
 Trách nhiệm chính 
Đảm bảo hệ thống hoạt động ổn định 
Theo dõi trạng thái hoạt động của ứng dụng: hiệu năng, tài nguyên, kết nối, luồng giao dịch.
Thực hiện các kiểm tra định kỳ: job/batch, interface, kết nối đối tác, certificate, cấu hình vận hành.
Chủ động phát hiện bất thường và đề xuất phương án phòng ngừa rủi ro.
Giám sát & xử lý sự cố 
Tiếp nhận và xử lý sự cố/ticket từ L1; phân tích log, trace giao dịch để khoanh vùng nguyên nhân.
Khôi phục dịch vụ theo quy trình vận hành được phân quyền.
Phối hợp với các đội liên quan (Infra, Dev, DBA, Security, đối tác) khi sự cố vượt quá phạm vi xử lý.
Ghi nhận sự cố, cập nhật knowledge base và đề xuất cải tiến.
Hỗ trợ bộ phận vận hành nghiệp vụ 
Hỗ trợ BO/CSKH/Nghiệp vụ trong việc tra soát giao dịch, kiểm tra trạng thái, xác minh dữ liệu.
Giải thích nguyên nhân lỗi giao dịch hoặc hành vi hệ thống dựa trên log và trạng thái xử lý.
Đảm bảo các báo cáo/luồng nghiệp vụ liên quan đến ứng dụng được thực thi đầy đủ và chính xác.
Tham gia triển khai thay đổi 
Tham gia vào quy trình quản lý thay đổi trong các bước: đánh giá kế hoạch, giám sát và xác nhận trạng thái ứng dụng sau thay đổi.
Xây dựng quy trình, tài liệu và đào tạo 
Tham gia xây dựng các quy trình của Khối Công nghệ.
Viết và cập nhật tài liệu vận hành (runbook, checklist, SOP).
Đào tạo L1 các thao tác vận hành, xử lý cảnh báo theo runbook/checklist/SOP.
Báo cáo định kỳ (số liệu vận hành, SLA, ticket xử lý,...).

jd_text:
Tham gia triển khai hạ tầng, migration ứng dụng/dữ liệu cho khách hàng Enterprise theo mô hình Landing Zone, với hệ thống DC–DR ở nhiều khu vực.
Mô tả công việc
Triển khai & vận hành hạ tầng
- Thiết kế, triển khai và mở rộng hạ tầng AWS/Azure theo Landing Zone.
- Xây dựng môi trường chạy ứng dụng (VM/Container/Serverless).
- Thiết lập hệ thống mạng: VPC/VNet, peering, VPN, Direct Connect/ExpressRoute.
Migration ứng dụng
- Tham gia đánh giá hệ thống (assessment) và đề xuất phương án migration: rehost, replatform, refactor.
- Triển khai migration bằng các công cụ chuyên dụng (AWS MGN, AWS DMS, Azure Migrate…).
- Hỗ trợ các đội ứng dụng trong quá trình chuyển đổi và cutover.
DevOps & Tự động hóa
- Xây dựng pipeline CI/CD, tự động hóa triển khai.
- Quản lý IaC bằng Terraform/CloudFormation/ARM/Bicep.
Vận hành & bảo mật
- Giám sát hệ thống với CloudWatch, Azure Monitor, Prometheus, ELK, Grafana.
- Triển khai bảo mật theo best practices (IAM, network security, encryption…).
- Troubleshoot sự cố hệ thống phân tán.

jd_text:
About the Role
We’re looking for a talented and passionate Senior Front-End Engineer to join our team and help us build a seamless freight experience for our customers. You’ll work closely with Product Managers, Designers, Backend Engineers, and QA to design and deliver elegant, high-performing web products.

 Responsibilities
Once you join our team, you will:
Partner cross-functionally with PM, Design, Backend, and QA to build smooth, delightful customer experiences end-to-end.
Lead the design and evolution of front-end architecture, ensuring scalability, maintainability, and performance.
Translate complex business requirements into clean, user-friendly UI solutions with strong attention to detail.
Propose, evaluate, and implement technical solutions to ambiguous or high-impact product challenges.
Improve engineering quality through best practices, code reviews, testing, and performance optimization.
Stay curious about emerging technologies, especially LLMs and AI-agent frameworks, and explore practical ways to apply them to our products and workflows.
Mentor and support other engineers, fostering a culture of learning, curiosity, and continuous improvement.

Tech Stack bạn sẽ làm việc:
NestJS – cấu trúc module, service, guard, auth. 
NextJS + React – hooks, SSR/SSG, state cơ bản, tổ chức code rõ ràng. 
Typescript – hiểu type, interface, generics cơ bản.

jd_text:
Key Responsibilities
AI ENGINEER
Work closely as a project team as the main contributor in the entire lifecycle of data science projects, from gathering business requirements to solution delivery, and deliver project outcomes to internal stakeholders or external customers.
Engages with clients to understand business needs, present findings, and align technical work with stakeholder goals.
Provides structured feedback to junior members, supports onboarding, and contributes to skill-building within the project team.
Developing scalable AI systems and designing/building algorithms that automate predictive data models.
Creating and managing the AI development and production infrastructure, including automating AI infrastructures for data science teams.
Participating in all phases of AI solutions development, from requirements definition and design to development, deployment, integration, maintenance, performance tuning, and monitoring.
Collaborating extensively with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, software engineers, and product managers, to define project requirements, ensure seamless progress, and facilitate AI adoption and best practices.
Driving scalability improvements and introducing new capabilities in machine learning platforms, often working across the full stack on tools and infrastructure that empower machine learning teams.
DATA SCIENTIST
Work closely as a project team to lead in the entire lifecycle of data science projects, from gathering business requirements to solution delivery, and deliver project outcomes to internal stakeholders or external customers.
Engages with clients to understand business needs, present findings, and align technical work with stakeholder goals.
Owns planning of assigned modules, contributes to task breakdown, estimation, and milestone alignment, and supports backlog grooming discussions.
Leads development of a complete module or sub-system (e.g., full model training pipeline or certain solution direction). Can propose solution design, test, and iterate independently. Coordinates with project lead to align with project needs.
Proactively explores and evaluates new tools or methods relevant to the problem domain and integrates them into module-level components with minimal supervision.
Provides structured feedback to junior members, supports onboarding, and contributes to skill-building within the project team.
Proactive in contributing to the growth of internal capabilities (e.g., training, knowledge-sharing, framework design).

jd_text:
1. Front-End Development
• Design and implement a modern, responsive web application front end using React.js.
• Ensure seamless user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design, optimized for performance, accessibility, and scalability across browsers and devices.
 2. Backend-for-Frontend (BFF) Layer
• Develop a BFF service layer to serve as the intermediary between the front end and backend systems.
• Provide optimized APIs, data aggregation, and transformation to ensure efficient communication, performance tuning, and maintainable client-server interaction.
 3. Additional Backend Components
• Design and implement supporting backend components, including but not limited to:
- Database architecture and schema design for structured and unstructured data.
- System integration with third-party APIs, services, and enterprise systems.
- Security monitoring, and scalability considerations to ensure enterprise-grade robustness.
 4. Backend Algorithm and AI Development (Better to have)
• Design and implement core backend services, with a strong emphasis on AI-driven capabilities.
• Key areas include:
- Generative AI (GenAI) integration, including standard Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) frameworks.
- Graph-based RAG approaches to enhance context linking and retrieval accuracy.
- AI Agent development for orchestration, task automation, and reasoning workflows.
- Data intake pipelines to support structured and unstructured data ingestion.
- Information retrieval systems optimized for speed, scalability, and relevance.

jd_text:
Role Summary: 
As a Senior Software Engineer - Mobile (Android), you will be responsible for the design, and development of our Android applications. You will play a critical role in ensuring high performance, scalability, security, and a world-class user experience. You will work closely with other engineers, product managers, designers, and QA specialists to deliver innovative and impactful mobile solutions. You will be a hands-on contributor, writing code, reviewing code, and mentoring other engineers. 
 Key Responsibilities: 
Hands-on Development: 
Design, build and maintain the end-to-end implementations that protect user privacy and user’s daily activities on digital platforms across the entire Android ecosystem. 
Collaborate with cross-functional teams (Product, QA, Backend, SOC, etc.) to deliver the secure, high-performance implementations aligned with the team’s overall strategy. 
Conduct code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to best practices. 
Performance Optimization: 
Identify and address performance bottlenecks in the Android applications. 
Optimize application performance for speed, responsiveness, and battery efficiency. 
Mentorship: 
Conduct code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to best practices. 
Mentor and coach junior engineers, helping them grow their technical skills. 
Security: 
Implement secure coding practices to protect user data and prevent vulnerabilities. 
Work closely with the security team to address security concerns. 
Problem Solving: 
Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues. 
Perform the duties and tasks assigned by your direct report or as otherwise instructed by the Company.

jd_text:
What do we do? 
As a pioneer for digital transformation, GFT develops sustainable solutions across new technologies – from cloud engineering and artificial intelligence to blockchain/DLT. With its deep technological expertise, strong partnerships, and comprehensive market know-how, GFT offers advice to the financial and insurance sectors, as well as the manufacturing industry. Through the intelligent use of IT solutions, GFT increases productivity and creates added value for clients. Companies gain easy and safe access to scalable IT applications and innovative business models. 
  Who are we? 
Having started in Germany in 1987, GFT Technologies has grown to become a trusted Software Engineering and Consulting specialist for the international financial industry, counting many of the world’s largest and best-known banks as our clients. We are an organization that empowers you to not only explore but also raise your potential and seek out opportunities that add value. At GFT, diversity, equality, and inclusion are at the core of who we are. Ensuring a diverse and inclusive working environment for all communities is one of the main pillars of our diversity strategy, based on our core values and culture. We have been certified for 2022/23 as a ‘Great Place to Work’ in the APAC region. So, if you want to have the opportunity to work with an outstanding and progressive organization, this position could be right for you. 
 Role Summary 
We are looking for experienced and talented (Senior) Backend Engineers to join our global engineering teams and developing and operating our flagship product (Digital Bank platform).

Write high quality, maintainable code using TDD and DDD
Translating user stories into working solution
Design and implement RESTful APIs
Design and implement microservice architecture within the give domain
Work with the distributed team in multiple time zones
Actively participate in Scrum technologies

jd_text:
Verticurl, a division of , was established in 2006 with the mission to be the world’s leading marketing technology services agency for multinational organizations. We enable our clients to assess, deploy and integrate MarTech platforms, activate customer experience technologies, implement lead management processes that accelerate revenue conversion and leverage marketing technology to achieve operational excellence. For more information, please visit the website:
 We are seeking a talented and experienced Senior Solution Architect to join our Creative Technology Hub, with a focus on modern web and mobile technologies, enhanced by creative tech and emerging innovations such as AR, VR, Web3, AI, and Machine Learning.
In this role, you will play a pivotal part in designing and delivering innovative, future-ready solutions that leverage these technologies to meet our clients’ evolving needs. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to define scalable, robust, and flexible architectures.
Your deep expertise in architectural principles, cloud solutions, DevOps practices, and cutting-edge technologies will be instrumental in shaping the technical direction of our projects and providing strong leadership across our development teams
 Responsibilities
 Architectural Design: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and develop scalable and efficient Web, Mobile solutions with AR, VR, AI, Web3, and Machine Learning. Apply your deep understanding of these technologies to create architectures that align with project requirements and business objectives.
Technical Leadership: Provide technical guidance and leadership to the development team, ensuring best practices and architectural standards are followed. Serve as a subject matter expert, staying up-to-date with the latest trends, tools, and frameworks in the creative technology space.
Solution Development: Work closely with clients and internal stakeholders to identify business needs and translate them into technical requirements. Lead the development of prototypes, proof of concepts, and production-ready Web, Mobile solutions using emerging technology
Collaboration: Collaborate with other Solution Architects, Software Engineers, Designers, and Project Managers to ensure seamless integration of creative technology solutions within larger projects. Foster a collaborative and innovative environment, promoting knowledge sharing and continuous learning.
Evaluation and Optimization: Evaluate existing systems and technologies, identifying areas for improvement and optimization. Provide recommendations for enhancements, architectural changes, or technology adoption to enhance overall solution quality and performance.
People Management: Lead and mentor a team of developers and technologists. Support their professional growth through coaching, performance feedback, and career development planning.

Our core services consist hundreds of Golang microservices built around domain oriented, event driven architecture. All run on GCP, GKE, Istio with autoscaling, resiliency and chaos engineering mindset with full end to end observability.
Our mobile platform was running on Android/iOS/Flutter, component based, composable architecture. Web app largely on TypeScript, React, NextJS, Tailwind CSS and composable in-house design components and framework. 
Gitlab for all code repository, CI/CD, with Backstage as centralized developer productivity platform.
DevOps culture, you are fully responsible with design, build, and operate your own services with support from SRE, Platform team as needed
Open source lover, and open source contributor. All tooling and platforms used was in-house custom built on popular open source projects
Embraced engineering culture, and agile development.

Accept failures, learn from it and move extremely fast. 
Flexible working environment, and performance-based optimization focus
Ownership and excellent learning opportunity, in-house and external

jd_text:
We are a global product team focused on building payment and e-commerce solutions that make an impact. We have dedicated our efforts to assisting merchants in running online businesses and reaching customers in every country in the world.
Who Are We Looking For
We’re looking for a proactive and results-driven Product Manager who thrives in fast-paced environments and is passionate about building impactful solutions. You should be strategic, customer-focused, and execution-oriented — capable of translating business needs into product strategy, aligning cross-functional teams, and driving the end-to-end product lifecycle from discovery to launch. If you excel at identifying opportunities, shipping valuable features, and continuously improving products based on data and feedback, this role is for you.
HONESTY and TRUST are core to who we are. We expect transparent and truthful communication from all our team members.
LEARNING and CURIOSITY are essential for growth here. You bring fresh ideas, creativity, and a desire to develop daily, absorbing knowledge from those around you.
Multilingual and Multilingual? Even better. You embrace international collaboration and thrive in global environments. Bonus points if you have cross-border experience or fluency in multiple languages.
Position Overview
As the Product Manager, you will drive the development and enhancement of our AI-powered global identity platform. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver a product that not only meets rigorous compliance standards but also provides an exceptional user experience across our diverse client base spanning 190+ countries.
What You Will Do
Lead the strategic planning and execution platform development, ensuring alignment with our vision of becoming the gold standard in identity verification
Orchestrate the implementation of advanced AI/ML technologies that power our automated verification processes, including state-of-the-art OCR, Face ID, Voice ID, Anti-deepfake, etc
Manage the development of our multimodal verification capabilities spanning ID document processing, face liveness verification, and AML screening across 200+ languages
Coordinate with engineering teams to enhance our microservice architecture, ensuring scalability and flexibility as our user base grows
Drive the continuous improvement of our REST APIs and SDKs for major platforms, facilitating seamless integration for our clients
Collaborate with data scientists and AI specialists to refine our dynamic risk assessment models and ensure they remain at the cutting edge of fraud detection
Balance the implementation of automated verification with human expert oversight to maintain the highest levels of accuracy and integrity
Ensure all platform developments adhere to global compliance standards and prioritize data privacy and security

About the Client - Elfo is a prominent provider of cutting-edge and specialized ERP systems in Norway. Their core development team in Ho Chi Minh City is responsible for keeping the solution at the cutting edge. Develop ERP applications with Azure, .NET core, C#, ASP.NET MVC, JQuery, MSSQL, Kendo, Vue.js

Spot opportunities for process and tool improvements, keeping an eye on latest updates on development best practice
You will also work with, resolving escalations and diagnosing issues or bugs
As a core team member at Elfo, you will be responsible for producing a high quality end product

jd_text:
Our mission at what3words is to become the global standard for addressing. Street addresses weren’t designed for 2025. They aren’t accurate enough to specify building entrances, and they don’t exist for parks, rural areas and many parts of the world. This makes it hard to find places and causes problems and inefficiencies on a global scale.
 That’s why we created what3words. We divided the world into 3m squares and gave each square a unique combination of three words. It’s the easiest way to find and share precise locations.
 In late 2024, we welcomed Swiftcomplete into the what3words family. Their expertise in fast, intelligent, and scalable address validation technology strengthens our ability to make location data even more accessible, accurate, and easy to use. Together, we’re building the most powerful addressing standard and address validation products in the world.
 Over the last year, what3words has been used in 193 countries, and our monthly active users continue to grow at an impressive pace. Our tech is used by emergency services, delivery companies, eCommerce businesses, ride-hailing apps and NGOs, and is integrated into the navigation systems of millions of cars around the world.

Who we’re looking for

We are looking for a Full Stack Staff Engineer to join our growing team of 25+ engineers in Ho Chi Minh City to own end‑to‑end delivery of an address autocomplete & validation app for Shopify, focusing on Checkout UI Extensions and app Admin configuration. This is an independent role (architecture → code → release). Work closely with Swiftcomplete Product Managers—who define scope & functionality—and co‑design based on your expertise.

Collaboration with Product Management

You’ll work closely with Swiftcomplete Product Managers who own scope and business outcomes. They will collaborate with you in the design process and expect you to contribute options and trade‑offs based on your engineering experience.

jd_text:
We are seeking an experienced Database Site Reliability Engineer (DBSRE) to support and operate enterprise-scale, mission-critical database platforms across PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL/MariaDB, and Microsoft SQL Server. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in high availability, performance tuning, disaster recovery.
 • Install, configure, and manage PostgreSQL (Patroni), MongoDB replica sets, MySQL/MariaDB HA, and MS SQL Server Always On in production environments.
• Ensure high availability, replication, and automated failover for mission-critical databases.
• Perform database and query performance tuning, indexing optimization, and resource utilization analysis.
• Maintain backup and recovery strategies using pgBackRest, PBM, Percona XtraBackup, and SQL Server native tools.
• Conduct Disaster Recovery (DR) drills, ensuring RTO/RPO compliance.
• Automate database provisioning, configuration, and operations.
• Implement and maintain monitoring and alerting using Prometheus, Grafana, and PMM.
• Perform database upgrades, migrations, and patching with minimal downtime.
• Implement strong security, access controls, encryption, and auditing practices.
• Maintain SOPs, technical documentation, architecture diagrams, and operational runbooks.
• Participate in 24x7 on-call rotations, resolve incidents, and ensure SLA adherence.

jd_text:
We are seeking a passionate, detail-oriented Associate Product Owner (APO) to join our team to drive a product development based on Google Cloud, Google Workspace and Gemini AI. Ideal candidates have 2–3 years of experience after graduation as a Business Analyst in software or enduser projects and aspire to advance into a Product Owner (PO) role in a few years. The APO will bridge business needs and technical execution, working with the businesses to define the roadmap, refine requirements, and translate them into actionable development tasks that deliver measurable business value.
Experience with web or mobile business applications in cloud environments is highly preferred, along with a solid understanding of web, mobile, and database technologies and the stages of modern application development.
Key Responsibilities
As an Associate Product Owner, you will collaborate closely with key stakeholders,and technical teams to ensure the successful design and delivery of solutions that align with business goals.
Product Backlog Management: Work with the Businesses to define, refine, and prioritize backlog items (user stories, features, epics) based on business value, technical feasibility, and alignment with product strategy.
Customer and Stakeholder Liaison: Serve as the voice of the customer and business stakeholders, ensuring the development team fully understands the rationale (“why”) and objectives (“what”) behind product requirements.
Requirement Elicitation and Definition: Collaborate with business users and stakeholders to gather, analyze, and translate requirements into clear and detailed user stories with acceptance criteria suitable for development.
Solution Validation: Support evaluation and validation of product solutions, ensuring proposals align with the product vision, business goals, and technical feasibility— particularly within cloud-based environments.
Acceptance and Quality Assurance: Coordinate or conduct User Acceptance Testing (UAT) to verify that completed features meet agreed acceptance criteria, business objectives, and quality standards.
Documentation: Prepare and maintain comprehensive product documentation, including feature specifications, user stories, process flows, and user manuals, ensuring alignment across teams and transparency in project execution

jd_text:
Chúng tôi đang tìm kiếm Senior Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) có kinh nghiệm chuyên sâu trong việc triển khai, vận hành và tối ưu hệ thống database trên môi trường Kubernetes (K8S).
Bạn sẽ đóng vai trò quan trọng trong việc đảm bảo hạ tầng dữ liệu luôn ổn định, hiệu năng cao, có khả năng mở rộng, và được giám sát chủ động thông qua hệ thống quan sát (observability) hiện đại.
Trách nhiệm chính
Nghiên cứu, triển khai, quản trị và tối ưu các database systems (PostgreSQL, Kafka, Opensearch, Redis, v.v.) trên Kubernetes.
Vận hành, tối ưu và mở rộng hệ thống Kubernetes cluster.
Thiết lập và quản lý các monitoring & alerting systems như Prometheus, Alertmanager, Grafana, ELK, v.v.
Define và tinh chỉnh metrics, alert thresholds, SLO/SLA, error budgets cho các dịch vụ database và hạ tầng quan trọng.
Tham gia xử lý sự cố (incident response), điều tra nguyên nhân gốc rễ (root cause analysis) và thực hiện post-mortem để tăng độ tin cậy hệ thống.
Tự động hóa quy trình vận hành (backup, failover, scaling, recovery, patching, CI/CD, etc.).
Xây dựng, chuẩn hóa runbook / playbook / documentation giúp đội ngũ phản ứng nhanh và hiệu quả trong tình huống khẩn cấp.
Phối hợp cùng team phát triển để cải tiến các sản phẩm database/big data.

 GO experience is a must. Reactjs and Nodejs is a PLUS!

 Founded in 2019, Oolio has rapidly grown into Australia’s largest hospitality tech 
provider, trusted by industry giants like Star Casinos. Our innovative solutions empower 
businesses to streamline operations, enhance guest experiences, and drive revenue 
growth. 
 With a global footprint, we have established offices in the UK, US, and New Zealand, 
delivering cutting-edge technology to some of the world's most dynamic hospitality 
brands. At Oolio, we’re not just building software—we’re shaping the future of hospitality 
with innovation, agility, and a passion for excellence. 🚀 
 As a leading hospitality technology company, delivering innovative solutions that help 
restaurants, cafes, and food service businesses streamline operations, integrate 
ordering and payments, and enhance customer experiences. Our platform is built on 
modern cloud-native technologies and follows an event-driven architecture, enabling 
high scalability and reliability.

Thiết kế kiến trúc hệ thống web (bao gồm cả database, API, microservices…) để đảm bảo tính mở rộng, bền vững và an toàn thông tin.
Tham gia code từ front-end “hút mắt” (HTML/CSS/JS/React/Angular…) đến back-end “vững chãi” (Java/.NET/PHP…), tích hợp CI/CD, container (Docker, Kubernetes) nếu cần.
Thường xuyên tối ưu code, rà soát hiệu năng hệ thống, “phản ứng nhanh” khi phát sinh lỗi để mang lại trải nghiệm mượt mà cho người dùng.
Phối hợp cùng team để không ngừng cải tiến giải pháp, áp dụng công nghệ mới, nâng cao bảo mật và khả năng chịu tải của sản phẩm.
Thực hiện và duy trì unit test, đảm bảo chất lượng code, sẵn sàng học hỏi và chia sẻ kiến thức với đồng đội.

jd_text:
The primary role of IT Security Solution job is to ensure that approved IT security policies, rules and/or configurations are implemented across MB Life IT security systems and its Infrastructure. This role of this job is to ensure that all security and/or monitoring software, computers, firewalls, servers, devices, appliances, and related IT infrastructure are up to date and configured based on existing MB Life corporate security rules, standard policies and procedures. This role requires the candidate to understand the security context and operational specifics of the BFSI industry, especially the integration and security protection of the core insurance system. The role also involves ensuring effective implementation of IT security practices within cloud environments (AWS, O365…). This role requires experience in the application of AI in cybersecurity operations such as threat detection, anomaly analysis, system monitoring, and automation. 
Ensures appropriate MB Life systems and/or devices are properly configured, updated and working appropriately to detect potential threats and security incidents.
Overseas and monitors the system security operations (cyber and internal) such as user account management, network vulnerability scanning, virus database update/scanning and other security measures (detailed below) are performed in accordance with existing MB Life standard policies and procedures.
Detection of anomalies, cyber threats and fraudulent use of computers and computer systems.
Security electronic communication (email and social media);
Protection of personal data and privacy.
Secure IT development with regards to MB Life business applications
Data masking, encryption, security testing, certification, digital signatures and Public Key Infrastructure
Provides support, education and training for all employees in terms of IT Security risk awareness within the organization.
Performs audits, reviews, analyses and report submission of security log files as described in approved IT security policies.
Participates in the review of investigations after breaches or incidents, including impact analysis and recommendations for avoiding similar vulnerabilities.
Provides technical support, education and training to all employees in terms of IT Security risk awareness within the organization.
Provides technical support and/or recommendation on IT security technology that would help align MB Life with the latest technology and industry standards

jd_text:
At OL Vietnam, we have worked alongside our parent company, Orange Logic LLC, to support some of the world’s largest enterprises with their digital asset management needs. Orange Logic provides a premier Digital Asset Management (DAM) platform that streamlines workflows, enhances collaboration, and ensures compliance across complex digital ecosystems, empowering any team working with digital content the ability to efficiently create, manage, and distribute their content at scale.
 WHAT DIFFERENTIATES ORANGE LOGIC
We are trusted by global leaders to work with over 100 customers, including many of the world's most recognized brands.
Our business is strong and resilient, even in the face of economic challenges. During the Covid economic downturn, we did not implement layoffs or reduce compensation. Instead, we continued to grow, consistently expanding our team and adding dozens of talented members to our R&D department each year.
You’ll work with top engineers and team members who are passionate about building flexible, scalable, and streamlined systems that will define the future of business management.
Job Summary: We are seeking a seasoned Software Architect to establish the architectural vision and technical stewardship for OL Vietnam. In this role, you won't just design systems; you will empower our engineering teams by creating clear architectural principles, patterns, and "paved roads" that enable them to build scalable, secure, and maintainable software with velocity. You will lead by influence—facilitating critical design decisions, mentoring engineers, and translating business strategy into a tangible technical roadmap that elevates our entire platform and application landscape.
 Essential Functions:
Architecture Strategy & Governance: Define and evolve the target architecture, principles, tech radar, and roadmaps; steward ADRs; facilitate architecture/design reviews; ensure decisions and trade‑offs are documented and communicated.
Application Architecture: Lead or facilitate system design for major initiatives; clarify domain boundaries and modularization; guide performance and reliability patterns (caching, concurrency/async, idempotency, retries/timeouts, graceful degradation).
Platform Architecture & Developer Experience: Establish standards for build/packaging, runtime environments, configuration and secrets, and environment promotion (dev/stage/prod); contribute paved paths (templates, reference repos) for CI/CD, release strategies (e.g., canary/blue‑green when useful), and fast rollbacks.
Hands-on Leadership & Execution: Lead by example by contributing directly to complex technical challenges, reference implementations, and critical proof-of-concepts. Prove your architectural standards are effective and pragmatic through hands-on implementation.
Containerization & Orchestration: Validate containerization and orchestration approaches during architectural reviews; align implementations with golden paths.
Data & Flow: Align integration and data‑flow patterns; recommend persistence choices (relational/NoSQL/search/cache) appropriate to use cases; ensure backup/restore considerations are in place.
Delivery & Enablement: Create reference implementations and migration plans; mentor engineers and tech leads; raise documentation quality (C4, sequence diagrams, RFCs/ADRs, onboarding guides).
Stakeholder Leadership: Translate business goals into architecture roadmaps with measurable outcomes; collaborate with product, platform/infra, and security teams.
Security & Quality Fundamentals: Champion security by design (authn/z, least privilege, encryption) and the adoption of baseline quality gates within the SDLC by partnering closely with platform and security teams.

jd_text:
Trusting Social is an AI Fintech pioneer that's revolutionizing credit access in emerging markets. Our mission is "Advancing AI to Meet the Financial Needs of Everyday Consumers with Empathy." We've assessed over 1 billion consumers across four countries, and we're on a mission to provide 100 million credit lines using the power of AI and Big Data.
How You'll Make an Impact
As a Data Scientist, eKYC at Trusting Social, you will be instrumental in building cutting-edge digital identity verification products for our eKYC (electronic Know Your Customer) projects. Your expertise in machine learning and computer vision will be crucial for developing robust systems to prevent fraud and money laundering. This role offers the opportunity to make a significant impact on revenue while also enhancing financial security, aligning with our strong social mission.
What You'll Do
Develop Advanced ML Models: Build various machine learning models in computer vision, implementing novel solutions for diverse ML problems (supervised, semi-supervised, unsupervised, one-class).
Research & Implement Cutting-Edge Algorithms: Research, design, and implement advanced ML models and algorithms to solve practical problems, optimizing for both performance and speed.
Build Practical Vision Systems: Work with high-dimensional image and video data to develop practical vision systems with a direct impact on revenue and profitability.
Optimize for Deployment: Optimize and deploy "tiny" ML solutions for limited computation power devices like mobile and web platforms.

We are looking for a talented Engineering Manager to join our outstanding team.
The Technical Manager’s responsibilities include understanding project objectives and developing plans and schedules to achieve them. You will be responsible for providing solutions to various technical problems encountered by team members in their work.
You should have excellent troubleshooting skills and extensive experience in resolving technical issues, while also mitigating risks through the implementation of safe and efficient processes. Additionally, you will be responsible for monitoring and recruiting new staff, reviewing workflows, preparing project reports, identifying risks, and providing cost and time estimates.
 You will collaborate closely with our China R&D team and be able to make sound decisions in a fast-paced environment. The ideal candidate should be confident, decisive, an experienced team leader, and possess strong communication and interpersonal skills.
 To be a successful Technical Manager, you should have deep expertise in your technical domain and enjoy collaborating with professionals from diverse backgrounds. The ideal candidate is highly self-motivated, well-organized, and adaptable to changing priorities.
 Key Responsibilities
Lead and manage the R&D team by setting clear objectives and ensuring successful project delivery.
Oversee system architecture design and technical roadmap planning to drive continuous improvement in mobile and backend technologies.
Mentor and support team members’ career development, conduct performance reviews, and provide technical training.
Collaborate closely with Product, Design, and Operations teams to ensure alignment between engineering and business goals.
Manage and optimize cloud infrastructure, ensuring high availability and cost efficiency of AWS/GCP resources.
Participate in key technical decisions, conduct risk assessments, and resolve complex technical challenges.
Understand written and verbal project briefs, and work with the team to define plans, schedules, and objectives.
Stay updated with the latest advancements in the technology and software development industry.
Conduct daily stand-up meetings to monitor progress and issues, compile weekly reports, and present outcomes to management.

Nhiệm vụ chính:
1. Tham gia xây dựng và triển khai định hướng cho các dự án AI
2. Lập kế hoạch chi tiết và quản lý các dự án phát triển và ứng dụng AI.
3. Giám sát và hỗ trợ đội ngũ phát triển trong việc phát triển và triển khai các giải pháp AI, đảm bảo chất lượng và hiệu suất cao nhất.
4. Làm việc chặt chẽ với các phòng ban liên quan tại Trung tâm AI (LLM, NLP, Computer Vision, Chatbot, R&D.v.v. và các đơn vị khác) để đảm bảo sự phối hợp nhịp nhàng và tối ưu hóa nguồn lực.
5. Cập nhật và nghiên cứu các công nghệ AI mới nhất, áp dụng vào các dự án thực tế.
6. Đảm bảo chất lượng và hiệu suất cho các dự án AI, thực hiện kiểm tra và đánh giá định kỳ.
7. Xác định và đánh giá các rủi ro trong quá trình triển khai dự án.
8. Tham gia tuyển dụng nhân tài, huấn luyện và phát triển đội ngũ

jd_text:
🚀 3 Lý do bạn không thể bỏ lỡ Rakus Vietnam
1. Không rào cản ngôn ngữ (No English/Japanese Required)
Tại Rakus, "Code" là ngôn ngữ duy nhất. Chúng tôi không yêu cầu kỹ năng tiếng Anh hay tiếng Nhật. Bạn chỉ cần tập trung vào chuyên môn kỹ thuật. Mọi rào cản ngôn ngữ đã có đội ngũ Comtor hỗ trợ.
2. 3 kỳ nghỉ dài (9 ngày liên tục/kỳ) mỗi năm
Chúng tôi trân trọng thời gian bạn dành cho gia đình. Ngoài kỳ nghỉ Tết Âm lịch, công ty chủ động thiết lập các kỳ nghỉ đặc biệt vào dịp Golden Week (tháng 4-5) và Năm mới Dương lịch (tháng 12-1). Mỗi dịp này bạn sẽ được nghỉ liên tục 9 ngày.
Bạn có thể thoải mái du lịch hay về quê mà không cần dùng đến phép năm!
Tổng số ngày nghỉ lễ trong năm lên đến hơn 30 ngày.
3. Nền tảng vững chắc (PHP/Java) x Công nghệ AI (Github Copilot, v.v.)
Chúng tôi phát triển sản phẩm SaaS ổn định được hơn 10.000 doanh nghiệp Nhật Bản tin dùng, nhưng quy trình làm việc luôn được cập nhật mới nhất.
Cấp tài khoản GitHub Copilot bản quyền cho toàn bộ kỹ sư.
Cấp tài khoản Devin, Claude Code cho những ai có nhu cầu.
Bạn sẽ phát triển thành một "Hybrid Engineer" – vừa có nền tảng Backend vững chắc, vừa thành thạo các công cụ AI hiện đại.
 ** Rakus Việt Nam là công ty 100% vốn đầu tư từ RAKUS Co., Ltd. - công ty nổi tiếng hàng đầu tại Nhật Bản cung cấp các dịch vụ đám mây (SaaS), giúp các doanh nghiệp điều hành hoạt động của mình một cách nhanh chóng, tiện dụng nhất. 
 **Chúng tôi đang tuyển dụng 4 vị trí PHP Software Engineer: LÀM VIỆC OFFLINE FULLTIME TẠI VĂN PHÒNG HEADOFFICE QUẬN 12 
- Domain: Hệ thống phần mềm phát hành và quản lý email Marketing - đang được sử dụng bởi hơn 1,7tr end-users tại thị trường Nhật Bản.
 Nếu: 
・Bạn muốn tham gia phát triển một dự án lớn có độ khó cao về nghiệp vụ. 
・Bạn có định hướng thăng tiến lên Principal Software Engineer/Technical Leader.
・Bạn mong muốn môi trường làm việc lâu dài (ít nhất 3 năm trở lên) 
・Bạn có năng lực tập trung và thích tìm hiểu sâu về 1 hệ thống. 
 Hãy gia nhập đội ngũ phát triển series sản phẩm "Rakuraku" – SaaS chiếm thị phần số 1 tại Nhật Bản.
Phát triển: Thiết kế, triển khai và kiểm thử các tính năng mới sử dụng PHP thuần (Pure PHP).
Quy trình AI: Tận dụng các công cụ AI mới nhất để tăng tốc độ coding, refactoring và tự động hóa kiểm thử (test automation).
Tư duy sản phẩm: Tập trung vào chất lượng code (Quality) và khả năng bảo trì dài hạn (Maintainability).

jd_text:
ABOUT US
Simpson Strong-Tie is a leader in engineered structural connectors, software, and solutions for the building industry. We maintain a reputation as a trusted manufacturer, partner, and corporate citizen committed to our customers and employees.
 Our Culture
Our founder, Barc Simpson, established  that we live out as company values—making Simpson Strong-Tie an inspiring place to work since 1956. Our team of talented people is united by a shared mission: to provide solutions that help people design and build safer, stronger structures.
 Outdoor Living Solutions
Simpson Strong-Tie Outdoor Living Solutions help homeowners and professionals design and build safe, strong, and beautiful outdoor structures like decks, pergolas, and fences. The product line includes decorative hardware, planning software, and project resources that simplify construction while ensuring code compliance. 
 YOU
As a Senior Software Developer with a Unity focus, you will be responsible for designing, modifying and developing software programming applications, ensuring customer satisfaction is met by all team members.
 WHAT YOU’LL BE DOING 
Application Development:
Be an integral part of the application development team, focusing on implementing business logic and data access layers using technologies such as Unity (60% of development responsibility) and integration with .NET Core backend service. Review, analyze, and enhance existing proprietary applications to fix issues, improve performance, and introduce new features—while maintaining high coding standards and leveraging tools like Visual Studio, Postman, and Swagger.
Technical Architecture & Design:
Develop technical architecture, design patterns, and implement plans for the team to follow.
Production Issue Troubleshooting:
Troubleshoot and resolve production issues reported by customers, internal consultants, or the software support team.
Agile Scrum Participation:
Attend Sprint Planning, Daily Standups, Sprint Reviews, and Sprint Retrospectives as part of the Agile Scrum software development lifecycle.

jd_text:
Build like a founder. Ship like Spartan.
 Our customers are scaling fast — and so are we. That’s why we’re looking for a Backend Engineer to join our world-class team.
At Spartan, we don’t act like vendors. We embed with startups backed by YC, Pear VC, BlingCap ,a16z, Techstars, and more — partnering with founders and engineers from Stanford, MIT, Yale, Google, Amazon, Uber, and beyond. Together, we help launch MVPs in 30 days and scale systems that power billions of requests.
This isn’t “just another backend role.” It’s a chance to work shoulder-to-shoulder with elite builders, solve complex startup challenges, and see your code directly drive companies raising millions on the global stage.
You’ll also be working at the frontier of AI: 70% of our portfolio today is LLM-powered. Our engineers leverage the latest tools like Cursor, Claude, and Codex to move faster, write cleaner code, and solve harder problems.
 What You’ll Do
Design and build scalable micro-services that power high-growth startups.
Ship fast with a proven process: async standups, PRDs/RFCs, code reviews, automation.
Work in an AI-native workflow — leveraging tools like Cursor, Claude, and Codex to speed up development, reduce boilerplate, and focus on solving core startup problems.
Uphold engineering excellence — clean code, testing, documentation, reliability.
Collaborate directly with US startup founders and product leaders — shaping solutions that drive their business forward.
Help shape Spartan’s engineering culture — we’re 1% pass-rate engineers who work like founders, not contractors.

jd_text:
Founded in 2016, Katalon is the category leader in AI-augmented software testing, empowering hybrid testers—those blending manual, automation, and AI skills—to deliver exceptional digital experiences. Katalon enables software teams of any size to deliver world-class customer experiences faster, easier, and more efficiently.
Since its first launch, Katalon has experienced tremendous growth, serving more than 30,000 teams across 80+ countries, many of which are in the Fortune Global 500. Katalon has been named a G2 Leader in software testing for 11 consecutive quarters and a Great Place to Work for three consecutive years. 
About the role:
Katalon is an AI-augmented test automation solution that automatically discovers, models, generates, and maintains user-journey test cases. TrueTest provides a streamlined test generation process, saving time and improving testing efficiency. As a Lead Software Engineer, you will play a critical role in developing and enhancing our flagship test automation tool, following the responsibilities of:
Collaborate closely with the product manager and team to develop and enhance the product's new features in addition to utilizing Generative AI technology.
Perform detailed technical analysis and design to break down the feature based on the high-level design and business requirements.
Develop and review code that meets the development standards for code style, design patterns, readability, and maintainability and integrates best practices for scaling.
Ensure product quality, security, and performance through technical accountability and peer collaboration.
Leverage AI Coding Assistants to boost development efficiency, automate repetitive tasks, and identify issues early.
Identify and implement improvements to the existing codebase.
Contribute to internal engineering groups to build reusable libraries, tools, and frameworks.
Diagnose and troubleshoot issues for customer support.
Support automation QAs and product specialists to maintain the demo system and write scripts using new Katalon features, to test applications.

- Phối hợp với chuyên gia hãng (Redhat, VMware, GitLab, BlackDuck, Palo Alto…) thiết kế hệ thống DevSecOps Pipeline, Automation theo các yêu cầu của khách hàng.
- Thực hiện triển khai các giải pháp đã xây dựng.
- Lập tài liệu cho các công việc liên quan đến quá trình triển khai.
- Nghiên cứu các giải pháp, công nghệ phần mềm theo định hướng của công ty.
- Hướng dẫn, đào tạo các nhân sự Junior/Fresher.

Kỹ năng:
- Kiến thức về các công nghệ của Redhat, VMware, GitLab, BlackDuck, Palo Alto.
- Kinh nghiệm về triển khai các dự án DevSecOps.
- Kỹ năng tư vấn, phân tích nhu cầu của khách hàng.
- Kỹ năng thiết kế hệ thống DevSecOps Pipeline, Automation.
- Kỹ năng lập tài liệu, báo cáo.
- Kỹ năng nghiên cứu, phát triển các giải pháp mới.
- Kỹ năng hướng dẫn, đào tạo.
- Kỹ năng làm việc độc lập, làm việc nhóm.
- Kỹ năng giao tiếp, trình bày.

Giáo dục:
- Đại học Bách khoa Hà Nội, Khoa Công nghệ thông tin (2014 - 2018)

Chứng chỉ:
- Chứng chỉ Redhat Certified Engineer (RHCE)
- Chứng chỉ VMware Certified Professional (VCP)
- Chứng chỉ GitLab Certified Associate (GCA)

job_title: Senior .NET Developer – working on smart AI solutions
jd_text:
Job Type: Full-time, Permanent
Level: Senior 
Location: Onsite - Pho Quang Street, Tan Son Hoa Ward, HCMC
 General Information:
We are seeking a Senior .NET Developer to join our engineering team working on international client projects. You will contribute to the development of web-based AI applications using .NET and collaborate closely with our project team and directly with the clients as well. If you know how to balance clean architecture with practical delivery, you’ll fit right in!
 Responsibilities:
Design and develop web applications for AI solutions for SMEs, using .Net.
Build responsive, interactive front-end features using modern JavaScript/TypeScript frameworks.
Design and optimize applications for performance and scalability.
Apply pragmatic software architecture and clean coding principles, balancing maintainability with fast delivery.
Participate in system design discussions, suggesting improvements and alternative solutions when appropriate.
Communicate effectively with the team and stakeholders to clarify requirements.
Ensure on-time delivery of features that meet both technical and business requirements.
Participate in internal reviews, testing, deployment, and documentation processes.

jd_text:
Infrastructure Management:
Design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable data pipelines to handle large datasets using both on-premise and cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure).
Implement and manage data storage solutions, including databases and data lakes, ensuring data integrity and performance. 
Data Integration:
Integrate data from various internal and external sources such as databases, APIs, flat files, and streaming data.
Ensure data consistency, quality, and reliability through rigorous validation and transformation processes. 
ETL Development: 
Develop and implement ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes to automate data ingestion, transformation, and loading into data warehouses and lakes. 
Optimize ETL workflows to ensure efficient processing and minimize data latency. 
Data Quality & Governance: 
Implement data quality checks and validation processes to ensure data accuracy and completeness. 
Develop data governance frameworks and policies to manage data lifecycle, metadata, and lineage. 
Collaboration and Support: 
Work closely with data scientists, AI engineers, and developers to understand their data needs and provide technical support. 
Facilitate effective communication and collaboration between the AI and data teams and other technical teams.
Continuous Improvement:
Identify areas for improvement in data infrastructure and pipeline processes.
Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies related to data engineering and big data
